official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to facilitate commerce by the domestic renewable energy industry and related service industries.
short_title: Renewable Energy Industry Development Act of 1983

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Renewable Energy Industry Development Act of 1983 - Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to require the Secretary of Commerce to conduct an evaluation of the domestic renewable energy industry and related service industries and to report his or her findings to Congress. Requires the Secretary to establish a program, on the basis of such evaluation, for enhancing commerce in renewable energy technologies. Provides that the funds required to carry out such program shall be requested for fiscal years beginning after September 30, 1984. Requires the establishment of an interagency working group which shall make recommendations to coordinate Government actions and programs affecting commerce in renewable energy products and related services.
